@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Decorator including all decoration possibilities from mixins:

  • Background color
  • Background image
  • Background gradient
  • Single and double borders
  • Border radius
  • Box shadow

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the configured padding minus the border width.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Map of top, right, bottom and left padding values
@return.description: Map of top, right, bottom and left padding values

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the styles of the decorator as a map with property names written in javascript style (e.g. fontWeight instead of font-weight).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: css {Boolean?} true if hyphenated CSS names should be returned.
@param.description: true if hyphenated CSS names should be returned.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Collects all the style information from the decorators.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Ensures that every propertyValue specified in propertyNames is an array. The value arrays are extended and repeated to match in length.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: propertyNames {Array} Array containing the propertyNames.
@param.description: Array containing the propertyNames.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Array} Array containing the extended value arrays.
@return.description: Array containing the extended value arrays.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Extends an array up to the given length by repeating the elements already present.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: array {Array} Incoming array. Has to contain at least one element.
@param.description: Incoming array. Has to contain at least one element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: to {Integer} Desired length. Must be greater than or equal to the the length of arr.
@param.description: Desired length. Must be greater than or equal to the the length of arr.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds the background-color styles to the given map

@param.name: @param
@param.body: styles {Map} CSS style map
@param.description: CSS style map

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property backgroundColor. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #backgroundColor}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property backgroundColor. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #backgroundColor}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property backgroundColor. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #backgroundColor}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Takes a styles map and adds the border radius styles in place to the given map. This is the needed behavior for {@link qx.ui.decoration.Decorator}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: styles {Map} A map to add the styles.
@param.description: A map to add the styles.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Takes a styles map and adds the linear background styles in place to the given map. This is the needed behavior for {@link qx.ui.decoration.Decorator}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: styles {Map} A map to add the styles.
@param.description: A map to add the styles.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Compute CSS rules to style the background with gradients. This can be called multiple times and SHOULD layer the gradients on top of each other and on top of existing backgrounds. Legacy implementation for old WebKit browsers (Chrome < 10).

@param.name: @param
@param.body: startColor {Color} The color to start the gradient with
@param.description: The color to start the gradient with

@param.name: @param
@param.body: endColor {Color} The color to end the gradient with
@param.description: The color to end the gradient with

@param.name: @param
@param.body: unit {Color} The unit in which startColorPosition and endColorPosition are measured
@param.description: The unit in which startColorPosition and endColorPosition are measured

@param.name: @param
@param.body: orientation {String} Either 'horizontal' or 'vertical'
@param.description: Either 'horizontal' or 'vertical'

@param.name: @param
@param.body: startColorPosition {Number} The position of the gradients starting point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left
@param.description: The position of the gradients starting point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left

@param.name: @param
@param.body: endColorPosition {Number} The position of the gradients ending point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left
@param.description: The position of the gradients ending point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left

@param.name: @param
@param.body: styles {Map} The complete styles currently poised to be applied by decorators. Should not be written to in this method (use backgroundStyle for that)
@param.description: The complete styles currently poised to be applied by decorators. Should not be written to in this method (use backgroundStyle for that)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: backgroundStyle {Map} This method should push new background styles onto this array.
@param.description: This method should push new background styles onto this array.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether this implementation supports multiple gradients atop each other (true).
@return.description: Whether this implementation supports multiple gradients atop each other (true).

@param.description: Either 'horizontal' or 'vertical'

@param.description: The position of the gradients starting point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left

@param.name: @param
@param.body: endColorPosition {Number} The position of the gradients ending point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left
@param.description: The position of the gradients ending point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left

@param.name: @param
@param.body: styles {Map} The complete styles currently poised to be applied by decorators. Should not be written to in this method (use backgroundStyle for that)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Compute CSS rules to style the background with gradients. This can be called multiple times and SHOULD layer the gradients on top of each other and on top of existing backgrounds. Old IE filter fallback.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: startColor {Color} The color to start the gradient with
@param.description: The color to start the gradient with

@param.name: @param
@param.body: endColor {Color} The color to end the gradient with
@param.description: The color to end the gradient with

@param.name: @param
@param.body: unit {Color} The unit in which startColorPosition and endColorPosition are measured
@param.description: The unit in which startColorPosition and endColorPosition are measured

@param.name: @param
@param.body: orientation {String} Either 'horizontal' or 'vertical'
@param.description: Either 'horizontal' or 'vertical'

@param.name: @param
@param.body: startColorPosition {Number} The position of the gradients starting point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left
@param.description: The position of the gradients starting point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left

@param.name: @param
@param.body: endColorPosition {Number} The position of the gradients ending point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left
@param.description: The position of the gradients ending point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left

@param.name: @param
@param.body: styles {Map} The complete styles currently poised to be applied by decorators. Should not be written to in this method (use backgroundStyle for that). Note: this particular implementation will do that because it needs to change the filter property.
@param.description: The complete styles currently poised to be applied by decorators. Should not be written to in this method (use backgroundStyle for that). Note: this particular implementation will do that because it needs to change the filter property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: backgroundStyle {Map} This method should push new background styles onto this array.
@param.description: This method should push new background styles onto this array.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether this implementation supports multiple gradients atop each other (false).
@return.description: Whether this implementation supports multiple gradients atop each other (false).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Compute CSS rules to style the background with gradients. This can be called multiple times and SHOULD layer the gradients on top of each other and on top of existing backgrounds. Default implementation (uses spec-compliant syntax).

@param.name: @param

@param.description: The color to start the gradient with

@param.description: The color to end the gradient with

@param.description: The unit in which startColorPosition and endColorPosition are measured

@param.name: @param

@param.description: Either 'horizontal' or 'vertical'

@param.name: @param
@param.body: startColorPosition {Number} The position of the gradients starting point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left
@param.description: The position of the gradients starting point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left

@param.name: @param
@param.body: endColorPosition {Number} The position of the gradients ending point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left
@param.description: The position of the gradients ending point, measured in unit units along the orientation axis from top or left

@param.name: @param
@param.body: styles {Map} The complete styles currently poised to be applied by decorators. Should not be written to in this method (use backgroundStyle for that)
@param.description: The complete styles currently poised to be applied by decorators. Should not be written to in this method (use backgroundStyle for that)

@param.name: @param
@param.body: backgroundStyle {Map} This method should push new background styles onto this array.
@param.description: This method should push new background styles onto this array.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether this implementation supports multiple gradients atop each other (true).
